test_scenarios.name: Successful Login
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: View Checking Account Balance
test_scenarios.expected_result: User can view the current balance of their checking account.

test_scenarios.name: Initiate External Transfer - Happy Path
steps: Select an existing external account or add a new one (assume existing account)
Confirm the transfer details and initiate the transfer.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The transfer is initiated successfully, and a confirmation message is displayed.

test_scenarios.name: View Investment Portfolio Overview
test_scenarios.expected_result: The Investment page should load showing a summary of the investments (if any). It should display the total investment value.
